CustomField.description: Bypass 2-Star Reapply Validation Rules - checking this box will clear the program's CLQ_2_Star_Reapplying_Date__c, allowing the 2-star program to reapply, prior to the required 4 year waiting period.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checking this box will clear the program's 2-star reapply date, allowing the 2-star program to reapply for a 2-star rating before its required 4 year waiting period is complete.
CustomField.label: Allow 2 Star Override
